vpdt_eigen_sym_matrix< T, 1 > Class Template Reference

A symmetric matrix represented in eigenvalue decomposition. More...

#include <vpdt_eigen_sym_matrix.h>

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class vpdt_eigen_sym_matrix< T, 1 >

A symmetric matrix represented in eigenvalue decomposition.

This partial specialization for the scalar case is no longer needed If you get an error related to this, you should be using a scalar instead.
